name: វិទ្យាល័យសុខអានព្រៃមេលង - School Portal
description: A React-based web application for វិទ្យាល័យសុខអានព្រៃមេលង, showcasing school information, achievements, and providing administrative functionalities. The interface is designed with Tailwind CSS for a modern and aesthetically pleasing user experience, supporting Khmer language.
